divs: sighting detailson or about december 1976 myself and about four others were out in the country on the paluxy river, in glen rose, tx. we had just finished up an evening of making our (milk money). we had been spotlighting for the fur business. we were all standing around talking when someone said 'look over there'. i looked but didn't see anything since i was looking on the ground for an animal. up in the sky traveling from glen rose towards us, which would be ese to wnw was a constant bright light at about 2,500 feet. i first saw it at about 30 degrees from the horizon. it was traveling at the speed of a pivate plane. when it reached about 45 degees it stopped and remained motionless for maybe ten seconds. i think someone may have hit it with a spotlight. the spotlights we used were from one million to three million candle power. it then went back in the direction that it came from, i can't recall if it was in the exact direction. it took about two seconds for the light to be out of eyesight. there was no noise to be heard. this was in a very rural area. it was a crystal clear night with no wind. we were standing at appoximately 32��� 14' 47"n, 97��� 51' 17"w (nad83\wgs84). as you can see this is flatland which was cleared of trees and was under cultivation. i had flown a private plane by this time.
